paper.title: The Effectiveness of Sills Indicators on Clustering tune Interbank Network
paper.abstract: How to identify Systemically Important Financial Institutions (SIFIs) which may cause systemic risk is a hotspot after the financial crisis. In this paper, we construct a clustering-tune interbank network based on the Holme-Kim model, and use the Kendall's Tau coefficient to study the effectiveness of four typical Sifts indicators based on network theory. The results show that the change of clustering coefficient will lead to unstable fluctuation of the effectiveness of SIFIs indicators, and the change of loss giving default (LGD) in the process of contagion will lead to U-shape of effectiveness of SIFIs indicators.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究如何识别系统性重要金融机构（SIFIs）及其对系统性风险的影响，这直接关联到金融风险管理领域。论文通过构建聚类调整的银行间网络和评估SIFIs指标的有效性，旨在管理和控制金融系统中的风险。
